text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo Typhoid Rand, if I didn't worry you'd infect them all with COVID-19 (like you tried with Congress) because you're a selfish jerk, I'd tell you to get down on your knees and grovel at the feet of every New Yorker. Your state would be bankrupt if not for theirs paying the bills.
